content:
I've covered post creation and plan to fix post to have an edit button to enter edit post mode. 
now I want to start looking at quest.

hopfully i can get it all functional as an MVP then work on visuals before beta relase and server hosting

also want quest log to display apop up that says can ave quest log wiht out a quest.

I need to make sure post are operate correctly 
post should be able to -
create a post
click on post to edit it 
click on post to react to it 
click on a post to repost it 
click on a post to link it 

link a post to a single quest or poehects 
link a quest to mutliple quest or projects
